main event: A witness observed a bright light moving erratically for 5-10 minutes in Centerville, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on May 11, 1961, at 1:45 A.M.,The object was described as a bright light of short duration,The witness noted the object's erratic movement,The sighting lasted for 5-10 minutes,The witness reported that the light was larger than the normal size of the moon.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: a civilian observer who noted the light's erratic movement
